meanings.definition: The management and organization of a household.
meanings.sent1: Housekeeping involves keeping the home tidy and organized.
meanings.sent2: My mom does the housekeeping every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent3: The housekeeping of toys in the playroom is a never-ending task.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous housekeeping of the kitchen made it sparkle like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: Good housekeeping habits can make daily chores easier to manage.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning and maintaining a house.
meanings.sent1: Housekeeping includes dusting, vacuuming, and doing laundry.
meanings.sent2: I dedicate an hour each day to housekeeping to keep my home clean.
meanings.sent3: The housekeeping of the bathroom is my least favorite chore.
meanings.sent4: She approached the housekeeping of her room with determination and a mop.
meanings.sent5: Regular housekeeping can prevent clutter from taking over your living space.

meanings.definition: The department responsible for cleaning and maintaining a building.
meanings.sent1: The housekeeping staff ensures the hotel rooms are spotless for guests.
meanings.sent2: Housekeeping in hospitals plays a crucial role in preventing infections.
meanings.sent3: The housekeeping team at the office always has a smile on their faces.
meanings.sent4: Housekeeping in commercial buildings involves more than just sweeping floors.
meanings.sent5: Effective housekeeping in schools creates a conducive learning environment.
